alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:57AM CST until March 08 at 8:40PM CST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... White River at Hazleton and at Petersburg. Wabash River at Montezuma...and at Terre Haute down to Mount Carmel. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford and near Rivervale..Multiple rounds of recent precipitation, preceded by snow melt, continue to keep minor flooding ongoing on the White River at Petersburg and Hazleton, and most of the Wabash River from Montezuma downstream. Moderate flooding on the Wabash at Mount Carmel is forecast to drop to minor flooding later today. Both rivers have crested and are receding. Flooding on the lower portions of the Wabash river is expected to last as long as about March 8. The White river flooding is expected to last until March 7. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Mount Carmel. * WHEN...Until Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.5 feet, Extensive lowland flooding in progress. Much of the flood plain activity is affected by high water. Numerous local river roads flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Thursday /10:45 AM EST Thursday/ the stage was 25.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CST Thursday /10:45 AM EST Thursday/ was 25.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening.
